Tools.Project1: A personal website that embodies my approach to modern web development and user-centered design. Built as an elegant digital business card, it features a clean structure, smooth interactions, and a strong focus on visual aesthetics. The site stands out for its intuitive navigation, responsive design, legible typography, and a professional color palette. In the projects section, each work is presented with careful attention to both functionality and visual detailâ€”reinforcing the idea that code can also be art.
Tools.Project2: A dynamic website that highlights my ability to bring ideas to life through clean code and engaging user experiences. My role focused on frontend development, animations, SEO optimization, and ensuring the site feels both interactive and enjoyable to explore. The design was a collaborative effort with a friend, and together we built a project that is both visually striking and impactful. The site demonstrates how thoughtful development and teamwork can transform ideas.
Tools.Project3: An innovative web platform designed to connect fitness enthusiasts with qualified personal trainers. My main contribution was in frontend development, where I implemented a responsive design and an intuitive user interface to enhance the user experience. The site features key functionalities such as detailed trainer profiles, advanced search options, and an easy-to-use booking system. Working closely with a team of designers and backend developers, I helped create a platform that is not only functional but also visually appealing, using an energizing color palette and clear typography to reflect the vitality of the fitness world.
Tools.Project4:
A modern travel website designed to elevate the flight selection experience through immersive 3D visualization. Users can explore different aircraft models in interactive 3D, allowing them to view planes from every angle and better understand what they are choosing before flying.

The platform also provides detailed seat class previews, enabling users to compare economy, business, and first-class seating layouts visually and intuitively. This helps travelers make informed decisions based on comfort, space, and overall experience.

In addition, the website includes a dedicated flight plans section where users can browse available routes, travel options, and flight packages in a clear and organized way. The project focuses on user experience, visual clarity, and modern web interaction to transform traditional flight booking into a more engaging and transparent process.
Tools.Project6:
I developed a website for WYK Homes, a home construction company based in the United States, specialized in Framing, Roofing, Remodeling, Siding, and Drywal. The main goal was to improve the visibility of their services and make it easier for potential clients. to get in touch.

The website features a clean and modern design, with easy navigation and clear calls to action. I focused on creating a responsive layout that works well on both desktop and mobile devices. Additionally, I implemented SEO best practices to help increase the site's ranking in search engine results.

Overall, the WYK Homes website serves as an effective online presence for the company, showcasing their expertise and making it simple for customers to learn more about their services and contact them for projects.
Tools.Project5:
Website developed for content creators, designed as a centralized link platform that organizes their content in a clear and visual manner.

The site divides links by food categories, such as Beef, Seafood, Chicken, and Pork, allowing users to easily navigate based on the type of content they are looking for.

Each section groups relevant links and direct access to the creator's social media, facilitating the connection between audience and content.

The main goal of the project is to offer a fast, intuitive, and organized experience, ideal for sharing multiple links from a single place, especially on social media.
